channel.title: Ryan Cullum
channel.description: Software Engineer - Game Developer - Life Long Learner

item.title: Mega Action Shooter
item.description: A top down 2D shooter prototype developed in Unity. The player is faced with multiple enemy types with the ability to use a range of different weapons. All programming done by me and art from opengameart.org. ~

item.title: Fallen King
item.description: This is a mobile 2D Platformer made in Unity where enemy and obstacle avoidance is crucial. It is a full game programmed by me using art downloaded from opengameart.org. ~

item.title: Match Three
item.description: This is a Bejeweled clone developed in Java using the LibGdx framework. The objective of the game is to match three gems of the same shape within a given time limit. Game programmed by me and art from opengameart.org.
